response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer for $110. This is a special opportunity to acquire it at a price slightly above its cost to us, ensuring you receive the best value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We're confident it will meet your expectations and exceed your needs. Please let us know if you're interested.", "product_price": 110}
